Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: மடியை மடியா ஒழுகல் குடியைக் குடியாக வேண்டு பவர்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Let those, who desire that their family may be illustrious, put away all idleness from their conduct.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown actively fighting and casting out a dark, sluggish, tar-like creature that represents Idleness ('மடியை'). They are treating it as a mortal enemy, not as a part of themselves ('மடியா ஒழுகல்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Because they have cast out idleness, the house behind them, which represents their family ('குடி'), is shown transforming from a simple dwelling into a magnificent, shining mansion, becoming a truly great and illustrious family ('குடியாக வேண்டுபவர்').
Layered_Composition.Background: A bright, clear sky, symbolizing the prosperous future of a family free from idleness.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Those who wish for their family to be great must treat idleness not as a habit, but as an enemy to be destroyed.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The tar-like creature is Idleness. The act of fighting and expelling it is key. The house transforming into a mansion is the direct reward for this action.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The tar monster is a dull, matte black. The person and their transforming house are bathed in a bright, constructive, golden light.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A dynamic shot showing the struggle and the resulting glorious transformation of the house.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with surreal transformation effects for the house.

Cultural_Anchors: Treating Idleness as not-Idleness (i.e., as an enemy)
The link between diligence and family honor.

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: person embracing the monster, house crumbling, text artifacts, cartoonish.
